questions.question: sore throat
questions.answer:
A saltwater gargle of 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon of table salt to 4-8 oz. of warm water can help soothe a sore throat.

Or drink honey mixed with warm water. Honey has antimicrobial properties that can help soothe a sore throat.
